text: This laptop is really good, it's brand new peice and comes with all the specifications mentioned in the details in product information, I saw some reviews related to warranty issue or only 5-6 months of warranty is remaining- for that we need to share the bill/ invoice details to Dell customer support, they will update the warranty as per the invoice date.Over all this laptop is good as compared to HP 15 or 15s with best display ( same as IPS) and good speaker sound, apart of them all specifications are same as HP.
